author: Joe Scott
description:
Get Nebula using my link for 40% off an annual subscription: https://go.nebula.tv/joescott

Watch my exclusive series on Mysteries of the Human Body: https://nebula.tv/joescottmysteries

World War 1 changed the world in countless ways, but one thing that doesn’t get talked about much is the way it spurred advancement in cosmetic surgery. With advances in medicine and the particular horror of trench warfare, thousands of soldiers came home with terrible facial injuries, causing them to be treated as pariahs. But thanks to the generosity and brilliance of surgeons and artists, great strides were made in returning their lives to normalcy.

title: How World War 1 Created Plastic Surgery
